arts.ttl: Heidenheim and Bochum share spoils in tense relegation battle
arts.sum: Georgios Masouras of Bochum takes a shot while under pressure from Heidenheim's defence, highlighting the visitors' early attacking intent. Heidenheim coach Frank Schmidt applauds his team's resilience following the injury to goalkeeper Kevin Müller.

arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim vs Bochum Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim, currently occupying the relegation playoff spot, host bottom-of-the-league Bochum in a crucial Bundesliga clash on Friday, May 2nd, 2025, at 19:30 GMT. Both teams are desperate for poin...

arts.ttl: Bundesliga relegation battle: The key men in the run-in for Heidenheim, Holstein Kiel and Bochum
arts.sum: Kiel’s 25-year-old striker Shuto Machino has been in red-hot form, scoring 10 goals and registering two assists in 29 outings. Marvin Pieringer's nine goal involvements (seven goals, two assists) from 28 Bundesliga showings is a solid return for a player tasked with filling big boots.

arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim vs. VfL Bochum preview: Strugglers go head to head for survival
arts.sum: Heidenheim welcome Bochum on Friday evening for a crucial clash at the bottom end of the Bundesliga. The visitors will be the first team to be relegated this season if they suffer a defeat.

arts.ttl: Bochum head coach Hecking primed for "intense duel" with Heidenheim
arts.sum: Here's what VfL Bochum gaffer Dieter Hecking had to say ahead of their crutch match with Heidenheim.
